cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiru

sentence.kanji: 今日はスーツを着ています。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha su-tsu wo kite imasu
sentence.english: I'm wearing a suit today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youbi

sentence.kanji: 曜日を間違えました。
sentence.romaji: youbi wo machigaemashita
sentence.english: I got the day of the week wrong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchi

sentence.kanji: 家に遊びに来てください。
sentence.romaji: uchi ni asobi ni kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please come over to my house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kayoubi

sentence.kanji: 火曜日に会議があります。
sentence.romaji: kayoubi ni kaigi ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a meeting on Tuesday.

cards.english: get up, get out of bed
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okiru

sentence.kanji: 私は毎朝6時に起きます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha maiasa rokuji ni okimasu
sentence.english: I get up at six o'clock every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okoru

sentence.kanji: 町で大事件が起こりました。
sentence.romaji: machi de daijiken ga okorimashita
sentence.english: There was a major incident in town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okosu

sentence.kanji: 明日、6時に起こしてください。
sentence.romaji: asu rokuji ni okoshite kudasai
sentence.english: Please wake me up tomorrow at six o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okiru

sentence.kanji: 近所で盗難事件が起きました。
sentence.romaji: kinjo de tounan jiken ga okimashita
sentence.english: Some burglaries occurred in the neighborhood.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niki

sentence.kanji: 私は毎日、日記を付けています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha mainichi niki wo tsukete imasu
sentence.english: I keep a diary every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dare

sentence.kanji: 誰と会ってみたいですか。
sentence.romaji: dare to ate mitai desu ka
sentence.english: Who would you like to meet one day?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utsukushii

sentence.kanji: この絵は美しいです。
sentence.romaji: kono e ha utsukushii desu
sentence.english: This picture is beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ie

sentence.kanji: ここが私の家です。
sentence.romaji: koko ga watashi no ie desu
sentence.english: This is my house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's denwa

sentence.kanji: あとで電話します。
sentence.romaji: atode denwa shimasu
sentence.english: I will call you later.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uriba

sentence.kanji: くつ売り場はどこですか。
sentence.romaji: kutsuuriba ha doko desu ka
sentence.english: Where is the shoe department?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tasuru

sentence.kanji: 気温は35度に達した。
sentence.romaji: kion ha sanjuugodo ni tashita
sentence.english: The temperature reached 35 degrees.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaze

sentence.kanji: 今日は風が強いです。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha kaze ga tsuyoi desu
sentence.english: The wind is strong today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukuzatsu

sentence.kanji: このプログラムはとても複雑です。
sentence.romaji: kono puroguramu ha totemo fukuzatsu desu
sentence.english: This program is very complicated.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uwagi

sentence.kanji: 暑いので上着を脱ぎました。
sentence.romaji: atsui no de uwagi wo nugimashita
sentence.english: I took my jacket off because it was hot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tochi

sentence.kanji: ここは父の土地です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha chichi no tochi desu
sentence.english: This is my father's land.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koujou

sentence.kanji: 彼は食品工場で働いています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shokuhin koujou de hataraite imasu
sentence.english: He's working at the food factory.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's narau

sentence.kanji: 彼は空手を習っています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha karate wo narate imasu
sentence.english: He's learning karate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tachiba

sentence.kanji: 彼女は自分の立場を分かっていない。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha jibun no tachiba wo wakate inai
sentence.english: She doesn't understand her position.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishuu

sentence.kanji: 明日は自習の時間がある。
sentence.romaji: asu ha jishuu no jikan ga aru
sentence.english: I have study time tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seikaku

sentence.kanji: 彼の計算は正確です。
sentence.romaji: kare no keisan ha seikaku desu
sentence.english: His calculation is accurate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's susumu

sentence.kanji: 前に進んでください。
sentence.romaji: mae ni susunde kudasai
sentence.english: Please move forward.

cards.english: entering a school of higher grade
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shingaku

sentence.kanji: 彼女は来年、大学に進学する。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha rainen daigaku ni shingaku suru
sentence.english: She'll enter college next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsumeru

sentence.kanji: 弟は切手を集めています。
sentence.romaji: otouto ha kite wo atsumete imasu
sentence.english: My little brother collects stamps.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsumaru

sentence.kanji: 駅前に人が集まっています。
sentence.romaji: ekimae ni hito ga atsumate imasu
sentence.english: Lots of people are gathered in front of the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's denchi

sentence.kanji: 新しい電池を入れましょう。
sentence.romaji: atarashii denchi wo iremashou
sentence.english: Let's put in a new battery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitagi

sentence.kanji: 私は下着を手で洗う。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha shitagi wo te de arau
sentence.english: I wash my underwear by hand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuwashii

sentence.kanji: もっと詳しく説明してください。
sentence.romaji: moto kuwashiku setsumei shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please explain in greater detail.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tashika

sentence.kanji: 彼の昇進は確かだ。
sentence.romaji: kare no shoushin ha tashika da
sentence.english: He's sure to get a promotion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisatsuguchi

sentence.kanji: 改札口で会いましょう。
sentence.romaji: kaisatsuguchi de aimashou
sentence.english: Let's meet at the ticket gate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dareka

sentence.kanji: 誰かに聞いてみてください。
sentence.romaji: dareka ni kiite mite kudasai
sentence.english: Please ask someone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiseru

sentence.kanji: 娘に可愛いドレスを着せた。
sentence.romaji: musume ni kawaii doresu wo kiseta
sentence.english: I dressed my daughter in a cute dress.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiiki

sentence.kanji: この地域は雨が多い。
sentence.romaji: kono chiiki ha ame ga ooi
sentence.english: There's a lot of rain in this region.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiken

sentence.kanji: 政権が交代した。
sentence.romaji: seiken ga koutai shita
sentence.english: There was a regime change.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yurusu

sentence.kanji: 私は彼を許しました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare wo yurushimashita
sentence.english: I forgave him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's susumeru

sentence.kanji: 早く授業を進めましょう。
sentence.romaji: hayaku jugyou wo susumemashou
sentence.english: Let's hurry up and proceed with our class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sentaku

sentence.kanji: 一週間、洗濯をしていない。
sentence.romaji: ishuukan sentaku wo shite inai
sentence.english: I haven't done the laundry for a week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's buta

sentence.kanji: 豚はすごく鼻が良い。
sentence.romaji: buta ha sugoku hana ga ii
sentence.english: Pigs have a very good sense of smell.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kozutsumi

sentence.kanji: フランスの友達から小包が届いた。
sentence.romaji: furansu no tomodachi kara kozutsumi ga todoita
sentence.english: A package arrived from a friend in France.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutsumu

sentence.kanji: プレゼントをきれいな紙で包みました。
sentence.romaji: purezento wo kirei na kami de tsutsumimashita
sentence.english: I wrapped the present in beautiful paper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hayaoki

sentence.kanji: 祖父は早起きです。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha hayaoki desu
sentence.english: My grandfather gets up early.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furo

sentence.kanji: 父は今お風呂に入っています。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha ima o furo ni haite imasu
sentence.english: My father's in the bath now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yu

sentence.kanji: お風呂のお湯が一杯です。
sentence.romaji: ofuro no oyu ga ipai desu
sentence.english: The bath is filled with hot water.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuku

sentence.kanji: 午後8時に大阪に着きます。
sentence.romaji: gogo hachiji ni oosaka ni tsukimasu
sentence.english: I arrive in Osaka at 8:00 pm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ike

sentence.kanji: 池に鯉がいます。
sentence.romaji: ike ni koi ga imasu
sentence.english: There are carp in the pond.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikadou

sentence.kanji: 地下道を通って行きましょう。
sentence.romaji: chikadou wo toote ikimashou
sentence.english: Let's go through the underpass.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chika

sentence.kanji: スタジオは地下にあります。
sentence.romaji: sutajio ha chika ni arimasu
sentence.english: The studio is in the basement.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chijou

sentence.kanji: この電車は地上を走ります。
sentence.romaji: kono densha ha chijou wo hashirimasu
sentence.english: This train runs on the surface.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joutatsu

sentence.kanji: 短い時間にずいぶん上達しましたね。
sentence.romaji: mijikai jikan ni zuibun joutatsu shimashita ne
sentence.english: You have progressed well in a short time.
